Committee: Tourism, Parks, Arts And Sports Development

Milestones.Committee: Tourism, Parks, Arts And Sports Development

Actions.Text: REFERRED TO TOURISM, PARKS, ARTS AND SPORTS DEVELOPMENT

Title: Authorizes the office of parks, recreation and historic preservation to establish a resident curator program for the rehabilitation of state park buildings
Summary: Authorizes the office of parks, recreation and historic preservation to establish a resident curator program for the rehabilitation of state park buildings.
LawSection: Parks, Recreation and Historic Preservation Law
LawCode: Amd ยง3.09, Pks & Rec L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the parks, recreation and historic preservation law, in relation to requiring the state commissioner of parks, recreation and historic preservation to consult with the state board for historic preservation prior to entering into a resident curator lease for any at risk structure, including those eligible for listing on the state and national registers of historic places, and to adopt a plan identifying at risk structures within state parks and historic sites
